Text: not sure if its clear or not, but i used the quadrophonic mix of Dark Side of the Moon, and not the regular cd or vinyl versions :D please leave comments!
Sounds interesting, you made this yourself from the original master tape?

more or less, i used the bluray copy of OZ that was on the pirate bay already, and i ripped the 5.1 mix of dark side, off of a dvd-audio disc (check ciscokid) so it's the best versions of both the video and the audio. and it's syncd properly aswell :D

I will be looking forward to it, then :) By the way its 4.1 not 5.1, the original master tapes where quadraphonic as you said (4.0). The remix filtered the bass out and mixed it into a separate channel.

Haven't finished loading it yet but will get back to you and tell you how I like it :)
you're right about the 4.1 and not 5.1, only i actually matched the front left and right channels into a fifth center channel so it's 5.1 in this version :D
... so what does everybody think? comments are appriciated :)

ohhh wel a more sweter it will become if u 
just do the 1st etter of each word in caps ON.

No offence... just a thought.....
i like my way of organization, helps me destinguish my torrents on the publicbt trackers. i also always put in the tags :)

Wow, the quality of the video and audio is amazing! I've listened to Dark Side of the Moon at least a million times and I'm hearing things in this recording I've never heard! I'm not knocking your work, it looks like the audio track might run a little later in relation to the movie..... at least the other copy I've seen of this has the songs starting at different times. In the one I saw the song Money started right as she opened the door to the house and you saw color.

yeah small problem with the 2nd half, but who cares really? lol most of the "sync-ups" happen with the first half anyways lol. someone uploaded a 1080p wizard of oz, the links for the dark side master tapes are in the discription so if someone wants to 1-up me, go ahead :D
